description.en:
Volume 1 Authors/Artists: DA HOOTCH (circle), Asanagi, BANG-YOU, Butcha-U, Castella☆, Gujira, Ika, Isako Rokurou, Kei., Kitsunetsuki, Kumacchi, Maboku, Majirou, mil, MuiMui, Rustle, Shindo L, xxzero

Volume 2 Authors/Artists: DA HOOTCH (circle), Aoi Nagisa, bbsacon, Gentle Sasaki, Jajara, Kawacchi Hirohiro, Kedama Gochou, Kitsuneno Ne, Maa-kun, Meme 50, Minazuki Juuzou, Mizuryuu Kei, Murasaki Syu, Neromasin, nuezou, OV, Rib:y(uhki), Rico, Shindo L, Takeda Hiromitsu

Volume 3 Authors/Artists: DA HOOTCH (circle), Akaume, Amagi Michihito, BLADE, Dagashi, Datenaoto, Denki Shougun, Hanauna, Igumox, Inue Shinsuke, Kanemaki Thomas, Kizaki, Kuro Densha, mikoyan, saitom, Shindo L, Sian, Tagane, Z-ton

NOTE:  Not all of volumes 1 & 2 have been scanlated.
